DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess clinical profile patient moderate severe psoriasis Spain . DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Clinical Profile Patients Spain With Moderate Severe Psoriasis .
DOC.detailed_description: This epidemiological , non-interventional , multi-centre , cross-sectional , retrospective , observational study assess clinical profile patient moderate severe psoriasis Spain . The data patient record , one visit . During visit specialist ask patient series question describe existence absence number condition associate treatment , record characteristic psoriasis experience patient type associate treatment . Not applicable
